'''2.3.645''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on March 8, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Improved how animations show up in the Launcher.
* Update to process of choosing a Java/Bedrock username from within the Launcher.

== Fixes ==
* Bug fixes to login and Launcher loading process.
* {{bug|MCL-23082}} - The loading screen with the allays fails to appear or produces a low fps animation on lower end machines.</onlyinclude>
